net.sf.appia.xml.utils
Class ChannelProperties

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable
          net.sf.appia.xml.utils.ChannelProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map
public class ChannelProperties
extends java.util.Hashtable

This class extends an Hashtable and it is meant to facilitate the definition of parameters to be passed to a channel and more specificaly to the respective sessions.

Author:
Jose Mocito
See Also:
Serialized Form

          Builds a ChannelProperties object with no parameters.

 SessionProperties getParams(java.lang.String key)
          Returns the parameters associated with a session.

          Associates the given parameters to a session name.

Method Detail

getParams

public SessionProperties getParams(java.lang.String key)
Returns the parameters associated with a session.

Parameters:
key - the name of the session.
Returns:
the parameters as a SessionProperties object, associated with the give session name.
See Also:
SessionProperties

putParams

public void putParams(java.lang.String key,
                      SessionProperties params)
Associates the given parameters to a session name.

Parameters:
key - the name of the session.
params - the parameters as a SessionProperties object, to be associated with the give session name.
See Also:
SessionProperties
